entry.title: ppolesiuk/type-systems-notes
entry.summary:
Lecture notes for the Type Systems course given in Autumn 2023

Lecture Notes on Type Systems

This repository contains lecture notes for the Type Systems course given in Institute of Computer Science, University of Wroc≈Çaw in Autumn 2023. The main idea behind these notes is to write them together with the students. We invite students attending the course to contribute to these notes. See Contribution Guideline for more details how to contribute to this project. You can also see our issue tracker.
